QuestData.Title: Burn the Candle at Both Ends
QuestData.Description:
Why you come back already? Have to wait until jobs are done or I no let you through!
Go back to Throne of Ordering Around and make sure they finish!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ensure that all of the kobold jobs are done.
QuestData.CompletionText: You come in when jobs are done.
QuestData.RewardText: What that?! You have Candleking's Special Candle!

Objectives.Objective: Sit on the Throne of Ordering Around
